item.name: Royal Sword

detail.itemDescription: The holy sword that attests to the strength of the royal family - A piece of the Royal outfit

item.gameDescription: Idol World, as the world's first 3D music game appears on Blockchain which players can experience a game full of appealing elements: hot-trending music, smooth characters, and amazing dance moves.
item.collectionDescription: The Royal costume emulates medieval emperors and queens. Transform into kings and queens with the main white outfit.
